content.label: Please update for iPhone X!!!

I know this game has been out for quite awhile, but I wanna write this for anyone thinking of getting it. Its much better than its advertised, which is already good. I love mechs and with the small list of good mech games, this is definitly close to the top of the list (under Armored Core of course).It is definitly worth the buy. Great graphics for a phone game, fun gameplay, and great challenges for those who want more.
I have to say this game is awesome. I wish they would update it for iOS 11 and iPhone X. It works well on the x but doesn’t utilize the whole screen.

This may very well be the best video game I have ever played. It’s definitely the best game I’ve played on mobile. Graphics that can give Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim a run for its money. A story that beats just about anything else I’ve played. Simple controls that fit perfectly. Attacks, upgrades and combos that never overlap. If ever there was a game to be rated as the best thing on the App Store, Implosion could take it.
Praising aside, my only complaint is that I wish there was a way to determine what the various stats in the game do.
All in all, if you haven’t bought this game, please do. It will be worth every penny.

title.label: Glad I got it for sale

content.label: Just got this game for 1 dollar only on a sale
Please make an update for iphone x.
Still fun but will change rating if they ever optimize the game for iPhone X

I bought this game for full price on android and Nintendo Switch and for $0.99 on iOS. It’s one of the best games I’ve ever played. Amazing story. Amazing gameplay. Amazing controls. The developers have made other great games as well
Way too dark. Crashes constantly. Waste of 10 bux. Enough said?
This game is phenomenal. It’s got amazing graphics, smooth animation, fast paced, and the mechs looks cool. My only problem with it is that it eats up battery like crazy.

Just finished the final boss. Took me about two weeks. What a game, what a work of art! The storyline, the production, it even has its own soundtrack! Cannot rave enough about the value of this product, it's such a masterpiece. It's gameplay is so good and 💯. Controls are so easy. 

These types of games are my favorite. Action, items, equipment, level up, bosses, great story, great graphics. It’s not a short game. It’s really entertaining and addicting. Lots of fun. I can really see how much work the developers put in this game.
iPhone X support please

title.label: One of The Best Games I’ve Ever Played

content.label: Implosion raises the bar and proves that mobile gaming can be so much more than paid ads and timed loot boxes. This is a REAL video game right in line with any 3DS, pc or console title. Any mobile game developer should use this game as an example.
UPDATE!!!! PLEASE FOR IPHONE X!!!!!
Still love this game
Please keep updating to iOS compatibility

Look, this game is great and all, and I know it’s been a while since anyone’s been on this topic (probably), but some of the badges require not being knocked down once in them... Which I’m fine with, but only when I stay far away from an enemy so they can’t hit me at all, and even then, that just doesn’t work too well when I have to fight up close in order do anything quickly. Now from the VERY few times it has worked properly enough for me to see, dodging with the right timing basically makes invincible during a dodge. That’s nice and all, but like I said, it only works a few times. And I have no idea why, I even moved around a bit before fighting anything, just to see that whenever I tap the dodge button, it doesn’t occasionally work when I want to dodge. I don’t know if this is a bug that was going to be fixed when this game was recieving a lot of attention from everyone, and then got ignored when the attention died down; if it is, could we fix it now? I know I’m only one person, so chances are you’ll probably ignore this, but I do enjoy this game. I just want to see if I can enjoy this a little more, and maybe see a fairer chance at getting those medals. Otherwise, I’m fine if you don’t, I’ll figure out something... Hopefully. But in case you have kept on reading, there are 2 other issues I’ve seen, which are in the title. Though you should know, the joystick not showing up has only happened rarely, and the whole purple aura timing thing still works, but when you go to tap the strike to try and execute any heavy attack, it will sometimes just not work, stop attacking altogether, and then restart the whole combo from the beginning. Not that it matters, but if you’ve read this far, then thank you for taking the time. And I’m sorry this review was long.

title.label: YOU MUST MAKE A SEQUEL TO THIS.

content.label:
01/24/2018 - I just started playing this again.  it is awesome.

This is the best shump/beatem up I’ve ever played.

title.label: One of the best action games on the App Store

content.label: This game is very good. The graphics are good, the action is good, but what makes this game stand out is the fact that it is mfi compatible. Once the game recognizes the connected controller, the game automatically shows what button corresponds to what action. It also has good replay value; all in all a great game.

title.label: 5 stars overall rating, but read ahead for more...

content.label:
I don’t get the pricing strategy RELATIVE to other games in the genre/App Store. That being said, I’ll drop 10 bucks on my way home from work on a pack of craft beer; I’d rather spend money on a quality game than have the alternative: ads, IAPs, money grabs, and $99 pack of ‘gems’, so thank you for that. 

It seems to me like a price more in line with competitors would allow this game to stay relevant in the marketplace longer, but I’m sure there’s a strategy behind all that somewhere in the business model: or they love their own creation too much to price according to others in the App Store. (Again, I don’t normally play free games, I like getting a self-contained game and gladly pay for it).  

Pricing strategy aside, PLEASE update so the game fits my iPhone X screen before I beat it! 

The controls can be frustrating when you’ve learned how a boss moves and trying to get out of the way before a planned attack: mostly because my left thumb slides off the small format game area (iPhone X) and the player just stands there and gets hit. But there’s a learning curve to it (again, still giving 5 stars)

If you like hack n slash/ level up games; I would recommend adding this one to your collection. Thanks team!
I love the game but with the upgrade to the IPhone X it isn’t using hardly enough of the screen that it should
This is an awesome game, good graphics and story. Im wondering when the iPhone X support will be add it.

Can’t kill the bad guys from Neuroplasticity on iPhone X. Can’t get the gun to aim at the bad guys. Can shoot everywhere around except at them. Works fine on iPhone 7 so I am guessing this is a bug on IPhone X. Dev please update the game for the new phones.
Great game, but can we get an update for iPhone X?
Give.... me.... moooooore!!!!

I don’t know where to begin the game is totally awesome. I know a little about apps I’ve been using iTunes for 10 years I will have over 10,000 apps. this game is definitely a work of art really nice detail in this game Great job guys keep up the good work in my book this game is probably the best game in the world I played ever.  I play Lotta  apps games but this game is better than console games like Xbox one and PS4.

my new favorite hack & slash game, would have given it 5 stars but the iCloud feature isn’t working. it took a few tries but it finally connected to enable iCloud but when i try to sync save data it ALWAYS say it failed. maybe i’m doing something wrong either way just thought i’d bring it up.
Realmente uno d los mejores juegos que he comprado, se disfruta desde el inicio. Seria bueno una nueva versión 2, 2017 o seguir avanzando dentro del mismo juego con mas mundos.

title.label: NEVER LOSE HOPE 但可以不要不更新嗎

content.label:
作為一個包括叔叔成就全通的玩家
只能說遊戲太久沒更新了
直接說感覺上的底線吧
如果要出2代另外付費也可以
(但玩家等這麼久如果只是出2代時先半價恐怕....)
但目前這版故事沒講完
連Deemo故事都更新好幾次了是吧
總不會說300元的高質感遊戲故事更新沒幾次？
遊戲照片好歹也5個人物啊？ 結果可玩到的只有兩支
叔叔算是支線
要嘛至少補足一些支線或補歷史(給關卡玩吧不要文字)也行
讓故事斷點更適合 順便讓玩家多玩幾個角色
不然從一開始就支持移動版的玩家
結果等了一年什麼都沒有
我相信失望的不只我而已

This game is worth every. Single. Penny! Everything from the graphics to the gameplay put you in a sense of intense virtual reality. The weapons are great! The levels are fun and challenging! The bosses bring out the best of you! But most of all, the story. You find yourself feeing the characters emotions, But not only that, you find that it's very hard to put down. The story is nothing but captivating as you delve deeper into game, drawing you into every level. It also doesn't become boring once you beat it! I think I played it more times than any other game I've had! This is definitely on my top three. Highly recommended this game to anyone looking for a great game to play and play again. Nice job Rayark! Keep it up!

title.label: The REALLY reason why this is great is...

content.label: For just one price and no pumping money into it, you get a game that is as intense, fully fleshed out on graphics, and good story line-- as any thing out there. Once you get to Chapter 3 and begin to experience more incredible potent power ups, and you find yourself playing this late at night, you will find yourself praying that these developers find it within themselves a sequel or some else as good for this genre.

title.label: By far one of the best-

content.label: Apps of all time. Flawless!

This game has definitely earned every bit of praise it has received. Almost console like in quality! What amazes me the most is that this is compatible with such a range of devices. 4S, iPad 2?!? Amazing, simply AMAZINGLY!!

Just finished the game and can say it's worth it. Engaging gameplay, straightforward controls and overall play, various levels of difficulty, and plenty of levels to keep you busy for hours. Definitely see there's some ongoing playability here too. Awesome graphics on the iPhone!!!

Smooth controls, beautiful steady fps, and lots of bonus content.  Worth the price tag.

Only complaint is replaying missions with story is annoying because you can't skip cutscenes.  Very frustrating when your trying to get the last badge on hard mode and have to restart the level and watch another cutscenes which you've seen a dozen times.

You have 1 sword and 1 gun and thats it...you can upgrade your robot but still its really not worth 10$ , i bought game cause of reviews and i'm writing this review for those who wants to buy this game,DO NOT buy this game, its worth 2$, you could have different swords and guns with different powers and fighting animation it could have a tree talent and lots of more stuff but the game has nothing, just run shoot and fight all the time , boring game
Wasted my money
Update: i just download dead effect 2 and...WOW it has lots of stuff and its FREE man one of my biggest mistake was buying this game,
Dont listen to others dont buy this game and play dead effect 2 for free i would pay 20$ for that game!!!!

My 14 year old game savvy son tried this game and said "Dad, that game is ridiculously hard!" Even on the "Easy" setting, it is "ridiculously difficult!" Wish it were more fun.. but it is "RIDICULOUS!" Come on guys!!
One of the games that made Apple Devices truly great gaming consoles.
I just started playing this game and all I can say is that this is the best IOS game I have ever played this might even be the best game on the App Store 10/10

This game looks excellent on the surface, and the graphics are phenomenal compared to other iPhone games on the market. But at the end of the day you spend $10 for like 2-3ish hours of fun after that the game gets mind numbingly boring. Oh yea, there are no sound options so enjoy listening to this game, and this game only.

New review:

After playing the game for a while, it got less fun. The strong points are the graphics and the controls. It gets repetitive and more grinding as you get father along. The upgrades don't seem to make a huge difference and I've accidentally sold good ones because it's confusing. The characters aren't very likeable and sound robotic. The story also makes sense in the sci-fi mecha setting but doesn't seem anything special. What seemed like an awesome game was just mostly cosmetic with not that much substance. I'm glad I got it on sale. It's a good game but flawed, and I grew frustrated with it where it just became hack-n-slash and too difficult/no fun.

Old review:

Just started playing it but I can already tell it's going to be good. No in-app purchases. Top-notch graphics. Interesting enough story. Great voice acting and music. Controls are easy to use and responsive. If you like sci-fi, robots, JRPGs, and fighting then you'll probably enjoy this game.

I was so excited while this game was downloading and it was even better than what I thought it would be! This game is one of the best games that I have ever played. It is hard, but that is one of the main reasons why this game is so great. I was stuck on the level when I was fighting Goldie, but it was a great experience. I hope the game will get updated with more missions like the "Last Man Standing" update. I also hope that the soundtrack will be released on iTunes. I am also very excited for Implosion: Zero Day. Thank you so much for this amazing game and I hope you make more 
games like this.

Best premium game on iOS. Plays best with iPad and MFi controller, but is perfectly playable with virtual controls and any device that supports it. DMC and Bayonetta fans must get this. Best of all, no IAPs.

title.label: Now this is how make a mobile game other devs follow this beautiful example

content.label:
Incredible game play great graphics best of all no pay to play scheme disguised as free. 

I can hardly believe this is a mobile game. It's looks and gameplay make it look like a console release.

The developers here truly have created a diamond of a game and I wish them success in there future endeavors which I hope include turning implosion into a series
Great action game.  Good story with excellent game play.

I'm not sure why this game has such rave reviews. I've played through the first chapter and have only experienced a very linear game that has left me feeling "meh". It's very repetitive and unrewarding.  No loot, character leveling that feels no different between levels, and little to no depth. Save your money, I wish I did.
everything about this game is fantastic... the controls, the graphics and the storyline!!! worth every penny!!!!
Love this game! The missions are short and sweet.
I've been playing this game for a long time on day one when it came out . When is a part 2 to this game is coming out ?????

I don't really know where to begin with this one. I'd have to say that this is the best--ever--game in the App Store. I was hooked from the minute the intro came on and from just that I knew it'd be awesome. I don't commonly write reviews(this is my third), but I felt like my reaction to this had to be shared. 
It was hard to see how a game could be even considered with a ten dollar price tag slapped on it, yet surprisingly I felt relieved I spent so much. Well, not that I spent so much, but rather what I got was beyond satisfactory. All of the RPG apps out there, as fun as they are, find it difficult to compete with this. Graphics are phenomenal and there's no lag, at least not on my device. The controls are perfect for mobile, and there's a ton of moves and upgrades to use(but not so many it doesn't distract you from the action).
 Yes, and the action! Nonstop yet diverse with each level--perfectly balances the story and combat. So if you're like me and can't make up your mind for your life, I recommend this game to you, and I promise...it's worth every penny. I mean, it's about a human-operated robot with a sword and laser gun fighting mechanically enhanced mutants in a dystopian future. What more could you ask for?
